actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 96-1523.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution to provide for the printing as a House Document of tributes made to the late Honorable F. Edward Hebert on the floor of the House.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration with amendment, H. Rept. 96-1523) Directs that the statements made on the floor of the House of Representatives with respect to the death of the Honorable F. Edward Hebert be printed as a House document. Authorizes the printing of 300 additional copies to be casebound for use by the Committee on Armed Services.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for the printing as a House Document of tributes made to the late Honorable F. Edward Hebert on the floor of the House.
